author: game.changer.wallet
title: Cardano Totem: Onboarding the World
description: Users living in under-developed areas stand to benefit from Cardano the most. Yet lack the infrastructure to use this new technology.
solution: A counter-top device for on-boarding, which prints a paper wallet. Using this receipt a user can interact with Cardano in a central location
experience:
Adriano Fiorenza: Lead developer of Gamechanger wallet
Maarten Menheere Msc: Design Engineer, completed fund 5 paper wallet terminal.
